page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content: Our area lies mainly within Bearsden and Milngavie District of Strathclyde Region but the North Eastern part lies in the Stirling District of Central Region .The boundary line follows the course of the River Allander for much of the way.There are 3 main areas where people live;the villages of Craigton and Mugdock and the northern part of Milngavie. Craigton is set on the side of the Kilpatrick Hills in the west. Milngavie is in the valley of the Allander with Mugdock lying above it.In the middle lies farmland for cattle and sheep three golf courses and Mugdock Country Park.The whole area is peaceful and unpolluted and a very good place to live.
